summary: AN ORDINANCE retitling, reclassifying and fixing compensation for certain positions in the Water Department; authorizing execution of a memorandum of Understanding with United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry, Local 32 amending Appendix "A" of the collective bargaining agreement between the City and the Union for the unit titled "Water Department Titles and Plumbers" which is effective through December 31, 1994; and providing payment therefor.
